region_name: Fire Temple Entrance Chamber
Fire Temple Entrance Chamber North

exits.Fire Temple Big Lava Room West: can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and transition('Fire Temple T37', True)
exits.Fire Temple Boss Door Room Entrance: transition('Fire Temple T17', has_fire_source or 'Fire Temple MQ Room 00 T17 Unbar')

region_name: Fire Temple Big Lava Room
Fire Temple Big Lava Room Exits

exits.Fire Temple Southern Cell:
has_explosives and (can_use(Hookshot) or
                (logic_fire_mq_bombable_chest and can_climb(83) and
                    (damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or can_use(Nayrus_Love))))
                and transition('Fire Temple T16', True)
exits.Fire Temple High Floor Tile Room:
(Progressive_Hookshot or (logic_fire_song_of_time and is_adult) or can_climb(136))
                and transition('Fire Temple T13',
                    (has_fire_source and (Bow or logic_fire_mq_bk_chest))
                    or 'Fire Temple MQ Room 01 T13 Unbar')
exits.Fire Temple Eastern Shaft: False and transition('Fire Temple T03', True)

region_name: Fire Temple Boss Door Room Entrance
Fire Temple Boss Door Room

locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Chest:
(logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic)) and (
                    (((can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_climb(100)) or
                    (logic_fire_mq_near_boss and can_use(Bow))) and has_fire_source) or 
                        (can_use(Hookshot) and (can_use(Fire_Arrows) or 
                            (can_use(Dins_Fire) and 
                            ((damage_multiplier != 'ohko' and damage_multiplier != 'quadruple') or can_use(Goron_Tunic) or 
                                can_use(Bow) or can_use(Longshot))))))

exits.Fire Temple Boss Door Room Entrance: Fire Temple Boss Door Room Hookshot Platform

can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot)
                or (can_climb(200) and 
                    ((damage_multiplier != 'ohko' and damage_multiplier != 'quadruple')
                    or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))
Fire Temple Boss Door Room Boss Platform

('Fire Temple Boss Door Stone' and is_adult)
                or (logic_fire_boss_door_jump and can_climb(97.75)) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (can_climb(200) and 
                    ((damage_multiplier != 'ohko' and damage_multiplier != 'quadruple')
                    or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))
exits.Fire Temple Flame Maze: False and transition('Fire Temple T02', True)

region_name: Fire Temple Boss Door Room Hookshot Platform

exits.Fire Temple Boss Door Room:
can_use(Hover_Boots) or ((can_climb(100) or can_use(Hookshot)) and 
                ((damage_multiplier != 'ohko' and damage_multiplier != 'quadruple')
                or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))
Fire Temple Boss Door Room Boss Platform

region_name: Fire Temple Boss Door Room Boss Platform

exits.Fire Temple Boss Door Room:
(logic_fewer_tunic_requirements or can_use(Goron_Tunic)) and
                (('Fire Temple Boss Door Stone' and is_adult)
                or can_climb(100) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots))

region_name: Fire Temple Flare Dancer Treasure Room

locations.Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest: 'Fire Temple Room 03 Enemies' and (can_climb(80) or can_use(Hookshot))

exits.Fire Temple Two-Sided Cell:
transition('Fire Temple T26',
                'Fire Temple Room 03 Enemies' or 'Fire Temple MQ Room 03 T26 Unbar')

region_name: Fire Temple Ascent to Stone Maze

exits.Fire Temple Ascent to Stone Maze Top:
can_climb(100) and 
                (has_fire_source or (logic_fire_mq_climb and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or can_climb(160))

region_name: Fire Temple Ascent to Stone Maze Top
Fire Temple Ascent to Stone Maze Rear
Fire Temple Stone Maze

exits:
((((has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer))
                or 'Fire Temple Room 05 Upper Cage') and can_use(Hookshot)) or can_climb(140)
exits.Fire Temple Eastern Shaft: transition('Fire Temple T22', 'Fire Temple MQ Room 05 T22 Unbar')
exits.Fire Temple Stone Maze Side Room:
has_explosives and transition('Fire Temple T19',
                logic_fire_mq_maze_side_room or can_hold_down_switch
                or 'Fire Temple MQ Room 05 T19 Unbar')

region_name: Fire Temple Stone Maze Upper

exits: can_use(Hookshot) and ((has_explosives or logic_rusted_switches) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (can_play(Song_of_Time) or can_use(Longshot))) or (logic_fire_scarecrow and can_use(Longshot))
exits.Fire Temple Stone Maze Side Room:
has_explosives and transition('Fire Temple T19',
                'Fire Temple Room 05 Upper Cage' or logic_fire_mq_maze_side_room or can_hold_down_switch
                or 'Fire Temple MQ Room 05 T19 Unbar')

region_name: Fire Temple Stone Maze Shortcut

exits.Fire Temple Stone Maze Upper: at('Fire Temple Stone Maze Upper', has_explosives)

region_name: Fire Temple Stone Maze Top
Fire Temple Eastern Shaft

exits.Fire Temple Lava Grate Room South: transition('Fire Temple T20', 'Fire Temple MQ Room 06 T20 Unbar')
exits.Fire Temple Lava Grate Room East: transition('Fire Temple T21', 'Fire Temple MQ Room 06 T21 Unbar')
exits.Fire Temple Big Lava Room: can_fall and transition('Fire Temple T03', True)

exits.Fire Temple Eastern Shaft: can_fall and transition('Fire Temple T04', True)

region_name: Fire Temple Hallway to Flame Maze
Fire Temple Flame Maze East

exits.Fire Temple Flame Maze Ledge: can_use(Hover_Boots) or ((is_adult or can_play(Song_of_Time)) and can_climb(80))

region_name: Fire Temple Flame Maze

exits.Fire Temple Boss Door Room: 'Fire Temple Boss Door Stone' and can_fall and transition('Fire Temple T02', True)
exits.Fire Temple Flame Maze Side Room: False and transition('Fire Temple T34', True)
exits.Fire Temple Flame Maze Ledge: can_climb(100) and (is_adult or can_play(Song_of_Time) or 'Fire Temple Flame Maze Ceiling Stone')

Fire Temple Flame Maze Ledge
Fire Temple Flame Maze North

exits.Fire Temple Western Tower: False and transition('Fire Temple T05', True)

Fire Temple Western Tower

locations.Fire Temple MQ Chest On Fire:
can_press_floor_switch and
                can_climb(100) or can_use(Scarecrow) or
                #Child can climb up the end of the stair, but I don't think is fast enough to get up from there
                (False and can_climb(70))

exits.Fire Temple Center of Flame Maze: can_fall and transition('Fire Temple T05', True)
exits.Fire Temple Center of Flame Maze West: can_fall and transition('Fire Temple T05', True)
exits.Fire Temple Center of Flame Maze East: can_fall and transition('Fire Temple T05', True)
